fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• Paladin activates the <Shield of Light> skill with every 5 basic attacks
• The skill provides a __health boost__ to the friendly unit with the lowest health within range.
• Each friendly may receive <Shield of Light> only once.
• Health increase: 300 / 350 / 400 / 450 / 500 / 50 / 600 / 650 / 1000

fields.name: Main Uses
fields.value: • Paladin has the highest *combined* health of all troops and are often used as placeholder troops for tank troops.
